issues.description: Overlapping career positions at University of Paris (Sorbonne) and Badinter, Bredin et partenaires (Bredin Prat) from 1965 to 1981. Requires verification if part-time or concurrent roles.
Overlapping career positions at Constitutional Council and as Minister of Justice from 1981 to 1986. Requires verification if part-time or concurrent roles.
Missing end date, marked as ongoing.
